remoteExpert.title: Inpes smart glasses and mobile app enabling remote assistance to support your frontline workers with real-time feedback and information from a distant expert.

howItWork.title: How remote expert solution works
howItWork.description: Remote expert is a software solution based on smart glasses, smartphones, tablets and PCs to share information between on-site operators and support departments. It effectively assists users executing difficult tasks and operation maintenance, having real-time data at hand, while keeping a close look at the remote situation.
howItWork.step1Description: usual Android  Download the time tracking app
howItWork.step2Description: Time tracking software allows employees to track time with one button. Choose specific tasks, projects, Work orders, clients, or locations.
howItWork.step3: Use time tracking software to generate time reports
howItWork.step3Description: Managers can create time reports that will allow them to learn more about how employees spend their working time. You can then use this information to create better estimates, streamline your workflow, and get projects done on time.

benefits.title: Transform your frontline workforce
benefits.description: With our market-leading industrial strength assisted reality solutions, deliver real-time access to information and expertise, anytime, anywhere
benefits.benefit3description: Use our software with a wide variety of smart glasses. Easily integrated in your system: CRM, ERP, CMMS, Salesforce
benefits.benefit4description: We use Transport Layer Security (TLS 1.2) encryption for all transmitted data. Sensible information and other metadata uploaded into our applications is encrypted with AES 256-bit encryption at rest.
benefits.benefit5description: System Integration. Easily integrated in your system: CRM, ERP, CMMS, Salesforce
benefits.benefit6description: End-to-end encryption WebRTC. Full HD video and audio calls

commonDescription.title: REMOTE EXPERT GUIDANCE
commonDescription.description: Frontline Workers can easily connect with remote experts in real-time, from anywhere, using optimized video collaboration applications
commonDescription.detailed: Organizations are facing evolving challenges when connecting remote teams with the critical information whenever they need it. The peer-to-peer information must be accurate, shared with a distributed workforce, secure and often delivered in real-time. Meanwhile, travel restrictions, globally dispersed stakeholders and different company regulations augment the growing logistical obstacles for remote expert guidance for businesses with frontline workers. These challenges impact many of todayâ€™s remote teams. Frontline workers who are often in the most hazardous environments need to safely and efficiently connect with remote experts, other team members as well as partners and clients â€” sometimes in different cities, time-zones and countries. Whether itâ€™s training, equipment repair, data analysis or other mission-critical tasks, these remote teams require a truly innovative remote collaboration and expert guidance solution thatâ€™s built for modern businesses.

effect.title: Benefits of remote assistance with smart glasses
effect.description: Smart glasses enabling 'See-What-I-See' (SWIS) and remote assistance provide video-conferencing capabilities that allow everyone in the call to see what the smart glasses wearer is seeing, from his or her point of view. This introduces a totally new way of collaborating and solving problems.
effect.effect1: Share knowledge and expertise in real-time to solve complex problems faster and more efficiently
effect.effect2: Reduce downtime or accelerate startup time of large capital equipment sites
effect.effect3: Faster intervention by eliminating travel time of expensive expert
effect.effect4: Cheaper intervention by eliminating travel costs
effect.effect5: Share experience on the work floor in an intuitive way among operators and field staff
effect.effect6: Continue operations in difficult to reach areas (conflict zones, Covid-19 quarantine areas countries with long VISA procedures, etc.)
